summary: During World War II in North Africa, a group of British commandos disguised as Italian soldiers must travel behind enemy lines and destroy a vital Nazi oil depot.
cast: Michael Caine|Nigel Davenport|Nigel Green|Harry Andrews|Patrick Jordan|Daniel Pilon|Martin Burland|George McKeenan|Bridget Espeet|Bernard Archard|Aly Ben Ayed|Enrique Ávila|Mohsen Ben Abdallah|Mohamed Kouka|Takis Emmanuel|Scott Miller|Michael Stevens|Anthony Stamboulieh|Jose Halufi|Vivian Pickles|Stanley Caine|Jeremy Child|Dennis Brennan|Rafael Albaicín
director: Director: André De Toth (as Andre De Toth)
title: Mercenarios sin gloria
